name: SAP NetWeaver Application Server存在未明漏洞（CNVD-2025-21159）
product: ["SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.53", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.54", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server KRNL64NUC 7.22", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.22EXT", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server KRNL64UC 7.22", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server KERNEL 7.22"]
description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server是德国思爱普（SAP）公司的一款应用程序服务器。SAP NetWeaver Application Server存在安全漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞可能导致读取、修改或删除敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://me.sap.com/notes/3627373
patch: SAP NetWeaver Application Server存在未明漏洞（CNVD-2025-21159）的补丁
